review: What a cool device!!  Love it!
author: Linda Sue Ridley

review: Works great.  Simple to install and the auto on feature is great. I was hoping it would work better with mt android tablet but a lot of programs don't work on even a generation old OS.
author: Bradley Schlesinger

review: Freaking awesome. Still figuring out all the cool stuff I can do with it, but it works seamlessly most every time.
author: Lucas Quintanilla "Venom"

review: Great.  Works as advertised.  Some apps have less-than-perfect implementation that results in, eg, volume changes switching app-to-app or obscure navigation controls, but the device itself has great picture, good sound, no problems with networking, ...Setup was a doddle.  Well thought-out.
author: Robert Marsanyi
